name: Gluten-Free Slow-Cooker Beef Brisket
description: A new twist on a classic way to make brisket.  So easy and gluten free!
recipeIngredient: 3  lb fresh beef brisket (not corned beef)
1  can (18.5 oz) Progressoâ„¢ Vegetable Classics French onion soup

recipeInstructions.text: In small bowl, mix garlic salt, onion powder and salt. Rub beef with mixture. Spray 5- to 6-quart slow cooker with cooking spray. Place beef in slower cooker. Pour 1 cup of the soup over beef.
Cover; cook on Low heat setting 8 to 10 hours.

Remove beef from slower cooker; skim fat from juices. Use 2 forks to pull beef into shreds; mix beef with reserved juices and remaining soup. Spoon into buns; top with cheese. Serve sliders alongside a bowl of soup.
